headline: Why we gather
statements: What if infection curves bent to computation?
What if every researcher spoke the same code?
copy: ImmUnity Horizons is **not** another conference. It’s a sandbox where data scientists, immunologists, designers and dreamers fuse ideas to fast-forward human health.
Across three immersive days we’ll remix models, spark serendipity and leave with prototypes ready for real-world labs.

quote.text: “The immune system is the original distributed network. We’re just teaching it JavaScript.”
quote.author: Prof. Aliresza Eslahchi
